alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz; Kofa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued July 26 at 6:22AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: .Copious moisture remains in place across the region. This setup is favorable for producing heavy rainfall in a short time. While not all areas will see rain, those places that receive repeated or extended periods of showers and storms may experience localized flash flooding. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Arizona, including the following areas, Central La Paz and Kofa. * WHEN...Through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
